Reference

Moran's I

Functions to calculate univariate and multivariate Moran’s I

BivariateMoransI()

Bivariate Moran's I

FitMoransI()

Fitted values of Moran's I

IrregularData()

Process irregular data shape (between two groups) for Moran's I

IrregularMoransI()

Moran's I between two groups (irregular data shape)

OLSMoransI()

Moran's I using ordinary least squares (OLS)

PermutationMoransI()

Permutation based Moran's I

UnivariateMoransI()

Univariate Moran's I

Local Indicators of Spatial Association

Functions to calculate local spatial statistics

LocalGi()

Local Getis-Ord Gi or Gi* statistics for spatial hot spot analysis

LocalMoransI()

Local Moran's I

PermutationGi()

Permutation based Getis-Ord Gi or Gi* statistics for spatial hots pot analysis

PermutationLocalI()

Permutation based local Moran's I

Spatial Component Analysis

Functions for Spatial Component Analysis (SCA)

LeeL()

Bivariate Moran's I using Lee's L measurement

SCA()

Spatial Component Analysis

SpatialXCorr()

Spatial cross-correlation

WartenbergM()

Bivariate Moran's I using Wartenberg's M matrix

Hexagonal Nearest Neighbor

Functions related to Hexagonal Nearest Neighbor (HNN) calculation

HnnImpute()

Hexagonal nearest neighbor based imputation

HnnNeighbor()

Hexagonal nearest neighbor

HnnWeight()

Hexagonal nearest neighbor weight

VisiumHnn()

10x Genomics Visium hexagonal nearest neighbor

Statistical Tests

Functions related to test statistics

BivariateMoransIStats()

Bivariate Moran's I statistics

LocalMoransIStats()

Local Moran's I statistics

PermutationCorr()

Permutation based p-value for Pearson's correlation coefficient

ZPvalue()

P-value of Z scores

Datasets

Available datasets to load

LoadData()

Load selected data

available.data

Available data

rspca-package

rspca: Spatial Component Analysis in R
